sessionSummary: Fixed critical stability issues in ContinuityCard (crash on missing timeline) and PipelineEngine (stuck state on failure). Added E2E regression tests for both.

decisions.rationale: To prevent the UI from getting stuck in 'Pipeline Active' state when tasks fail and no further progress is possible.
alternatives: Allow partial completion (complex UI handling needed)

currentState.status: Stability fixes applied and verified with E2E tests.
